projects.title: NeuroChatRAG - Medical AI System
projects.description: Award-winning RAG system for neurological disease information with dual-complexity responses
projects.fullDescription: NeuroChatRAG is an award-winning Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that provides accurate, context-aware responses about neurological conditions including Multiple Sclerosis, Parkinson's, Alzheimer's, and Stroke. Winner of TWISE Night Challenge by ARSII, this system democratizes access to reliable medical information through an intelligent conversational interface that adapts to user expertise levels.
impact: üèÜ Won TWISE Night Challenge - 'Implementation of RAG-based conversational agent for neurological diseases medical information site'
üî¨ Processed 9,000+ PubMed articles for comprehensive neurological disease coverage
üéØ Dual-complexity interface serving both healthcare professionals and general public
‚ö° Real-time assessment with transparent information showing both AI-generated answers and retrieved medical context

projects.title: DocConnect - University Management Platform
projects.description: Full-stack professor availability system with real-time notifications and Docker deployment
projects.fullDescription: DocConnect is a comprehensive full-stack web application that solves the real-world university problem of students not knowing when professors are available for consultations. The system allows professors to update their real-time availability status while enabling students to track availability, set notifications, and manage favorites - eliminating wasted trips to professors' offices.
impact: üè´ Solves actual university workflow problems - students frequently visiting professors during non-available hours
üîß Complete containerization with Docker Compose for one-command deployment anywhere
üîê Production-ready with JWT stateless authentication and comprehensive security implementation
üìä Real-time data management with notification system and status history tracking

projects.title: Female Farmers Health Risk Analysis
projects.description: AI-powered agricultural health risk assessment with PCA/MCA dimensionality reduction and multilingual NLP
projects.fullDescription: An AI-powered agricultural health risk assessment platform specifically designed to address occupational health hazards faced by women farmers. The system uses sophisticated PCA/MCA dimensionality reduction with machine learning for comprehensive health risk assessment, processing French agricultural interviews to extract structured health risk factors.
impact: üåç Addresses critical public health crisis affecting millions of agricultural workers globally
üìä Sophisticated PCA/MCA dimensionality reduction reducing feature space by 70% while preserving 95% variance
üá´üá∑ Domain-specific NLP system for French agricultural terminology with custom keyword extraction
‚öïÔ∏è Multi-modal risk modeling (respiratory/skin/neurological) with 85%+ accuracy using reduced-dimension feature space

projects.title: Student Housing Management System
projects.description: Full-stack Java/React platform for property management with advanced search and responsive design
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive property management system using Java 21, Jersey (JAX-RS), and MySQL. Built RESTful API with advanced search capabilities, implementing proper layered architecture and CORS configuration. Integrated React TypeScript frontend with responsive design using Tailwind CSS.
impact: üè† Addresses $15+ billion student housing market challenge in the US
üîç Advanced search & filtering capabilities with real-time form validation
üèóÔ∏è Clean MVC architecture with proper separation of concerns
üì± Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop with modern UI styling

projects.title: Linear Algebra Calculator
projects.description: Comprehensive Java-based mathematical computation system with multiple algorithms and educational video
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive Java-based linear algebra calculator designed for advanced mathematical computations. The system implements multiple matrix operations and system resolution algorithms, supporting various specialized matrix types for optimized performance including LU decomposition, Gaussian elimination, Cholesky decomposition, and Jacobi iteration.
impact: üßÆ Multiple system resolution methods (direct & iterative) with performance optimization
üìö Educational video tutorial creation for academic use
‚ö° Performance-optimized algorithms for specialized matrix types (sparse, banded, triangular)
üéì Collaborative 3-person team delivery of educational software

projects.title: MKP Metaheuristics Optimization Platform
projects.description: Interactive visualization platform comparing multiple metaheuristic algorithms for Multiple Knapsack Problem
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive implementation and comparison of metaheuristic optimization algorithms specifically designed for solving the Multiple Knapsack Problem (MKP) - a classic NP-complete combinatorial optimization problem. Includes an interactive web-based visualization dashboard for algorithm performance analysis with React.js deployment.
impact: üß¨ Implemented 4 state-of-the-art metaheuristic algorithms (Binary PSO, BGSA, Hybrid PSO-GSA, BWOA)
üìä Interactive web-based visualization dashboard with real-time algorithm performance analysis
üî¨ Comprehensive benchmarking framework for optimization algorithm comparison with convergence analysis
üéØ Academic research contribution with live demonstration platform showcasing algorithm effectiveness

projects.title: AI-Powered Universal Feedback Platform
projects.description: Real-time sentiment analysis platform with DistilBERT achieving 95% accuracy vs 60% keyword matching
projects.fullDescription: A real-time feedback collection and analytics platform that uses machine learning for sentiment analysis. The system supports multiple event types (research conferences, weddings, corporate demos) with customizable themes and provides live dashboard analytics using DistilBERT multilingual sentiment model.
impact: ü§ñ Real-time AI sentiment analysis using DistilBERT (95% accuracy vs 60% keyword matching)
üé≠ Multi-tenant event management with customizable themes and branding
üìä Live dashboards with interactive charts and real-time updates
üîÑ QR code generation for easy mobile access to feedback forms with multilingual support

projects.title: Kubernetes NFS Storage Platform
projects.description: Automated 3-node Kubernetes cluster with NFSv4 persistent storage using Infrastructure as Code
projects.fullDescription: A sophisticated implementation of Network File System (NFS) services within a Kubernetes cluster environment, featuring advanced automation, performance optimization, and hybrid storage capabilities. The project demonstrates the evolution from traditional storage protocols to modern cloud-native infrastructure through strategic enhancements and comprehensive automation.
impact: üîß Comprehensive automation framework reducing manual configuration by 90%
üèóÔ∏è Hybrid storage solution integrating traditional NFS with MinIO object storage
üìà Performance optimization strategies achieving measurable improvements in throughput
üîÑ Automated snapshot and recovery system for data protection with point-in-time restore capabilities

projects.title: Plant Disease Classification Using Deep Learning
projects.description: Transfer learning comparison study for agricultural disease detection with VGG16 vs ResNet50
projects.fullDescription: A comparative study of transfer learning strategies for agricultural disease detection using limited dataset, focused on optimal model selection for small-scale agricultural applications. The system classifies plant diseases across 3 categories (Healthy, Powdery, Rust diseases) with comprehensive evaluation using confusion matrices, precision, recall, F1-scores.
impact: üå± Research-validated findings: VGG16 outperformed ResNet50 on small datasets due to reduced overfitting
üìä Comprehensive evaluation using confusion matrices, precision, recall, F1-scores beyond simple accuracy
üî¨ Best results with partial freezing strategy achieving optimal balance between feature preservation and domain adaptation
üåê Interactive web application for real-time disease classification with educational documentation

projects.title: North Indian Cuisine Semantic Search System
projects.description: CPU-optimized semantic search for safe ingredient discovery with vector embeddings across 3,500+ recipes
projects.fullDescription: A CPU-optimized semantic search application that enables safe and intelligent recipe discovery through vector embeddings, helping users (especially those with food allergies) quickly identify ingredients in 3,500+ authentic North Indian recipes. Built during a month-long visit to North India to understand local cuisine and ingredients.
impact: üçΩÔ∏è Safety-first search enabling people with food allergies to quickly check ingredient lists
üîç Three search types: recipe-to-ingredients, ingredient-to-recipes, and general cuisine exploration
üìä Data engineering: processed 6,871 raw recipes ‚Üí 3,499 clean recipes with 57% quality improvement
üåè Practical health safety tool solving real-world travel and dietary management challenges

projects.title: Construction Safety Helmet Detection System
projects.description: YOLOv8-based safety monitoring with real-time compliance tracking achieving 63.6% mAP50
projects.fullDescription: A computer vision application that monitors construction sites for proper helmet usage using YOLOv8 object detection, providing real-time safety compliance monitoring through a web interface. The system processes images, videos, and live webcam feeds with safety analytics and violation detection.
impact: ü¶∫ Trained custom YOLOv8 model achieving 63.6% mAP50 across 3 classes (helmet, head, person)
‚ö° Real-time processing with sub-second inference times for safety monitoring applications
üìä Safety analytics with real-time compliance tracking, violation detection, and timeline visualization
üîß Complete dataset engineering pipeline converting PASCAL VOC annotations to YOLO format
